# Zero Variable in R

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
```

```{r}
nearZeroVar(iris[, -5], saveMetrics = TRUE)
```

```{r}
data(BloodBrain)
nearZeroVar(bbbDescr)
str(bbbDescr)
```


```{r}
nearZeroVar(bbbDescr, saveMetrics = T, names = TRUE) %>% 
  filter(nzv == TRUE)
```

```{r}
nearZeroVar(pg[,3:6], saveMetrics = T)
```
